options.label: Да
options.value: .comments:not(.comments_forever-small) .comments-avatar_unauthorized,.longread-feed-item-image,.longread-wide__header,.news-feed .news-feed-item figure .news-feed-item-image__image,.public-main-author__image-block,.public-main-author__socials a,.region-news .news-feed-item figure .news-feed-item-image__image,.sharing__socials-item,.social-share__icon,iframe,img,img[src*=gif],video{transition:.4s;-webkit-filter:brightness(.6) saturate(.4);filter:brightness(.6) saturate(.4)}.comments:not(.comments_forever-small) .comments-form:hover .comments-avatar_unauthorized,.longread-feed-item.with-image:hover .longread-feed-item-image,.longread-wide__header:hover,.news-feed .news-feed-item:hover figure .news-feed-item-image__image,.public-main-author:hover .public-main-author__image-block,.public-main-author__socials a:hover,.region-news .news-feed-item:hover figure .news-feed-item-image__image,.sharing__socials-item:hover,.social-share__icon:hover,iframe:hover,img:hover,img[src*=gif]:hover,video:hover{transition:.4s;-webkit-filter:brightness(1) saturate(1);filter:brightness(1) saturate(1)}
